welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Andres de Llevaneras
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Andres de Llevaneras, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Girona-Costa Brava Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Prat De Llobregat Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at El Prat De Llobregat Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
